name: Easy Shipping for Woocommerce
author: DigitCode

sections.description:
Flat rate shipping plugin is the most powerful, easy, and flexible shipping plugin for WooCommerce store owners.

It allows you to create multiple custom flat rate shipping methods based on conditions like a product, country, cart-subtotal, quantity, category, product tag, and user-based shipping method

Easy Shipping for Woocommerce is easy, and flexible shipping plugin for WooCommerce store owners. It’s including the following:

  • Create multiple custom flat rate shipping methods
  • Advanced free shipping configuration
  • Free shipping based on customer postcode
  • Free shipping based on minimum order
  • Advanced free shipping configuration
  • Add description to your shipping method that will be display for user
  • Set minimum and maximum shipping cost
  • Conditional Shipping Cost
  • Shipping cost based on cart total and/or weight
  • Hide shipping method if user is not logged
  • Hide all orthers methods when free shipping is available
  • Export and Import shipping methods
  • Enable/disable shipping method based on date
  • Stopping a rule (if the rule is matched the following rules will not be calculated)
  • Free shipping coupons support

Feedback

We are developing this plugin for you.
If you discover a bug, you need a feature or have any idea to, let us know by posting your suggestion on the plugin reviews page
or you can write us
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Add new rules for applying shipping cost.

1.0.3

  • Free shipping based on customer postcode.

1.0.2

  • Conditional Shipping Cost.

1.0.1

  • Add more option for free shipping.
  • Shipping can have max amount.

1.0

  • This is first version.

short_description: Easy Shipping for Woocommerce allows you to easily create new shipping methods. It is a very flexible plugin with which you can condition the pricing  …
